game.name: Lucky Card
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Lucky Card takes scratch cards as its prototype and integrates roguelite, strategic deck-building, and inventory management gameplay. It creates a unique immersive experience that real-world scratch cards can never replicate.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lucky Card takes scratch cards as its prototype and integrates roguelite, strategic deck-building, and inventory management gameplay. It creates a unique immersive experience that real-world scratch cards can never replicate.
